API Reference
============

This section provides detailed API documentation for all Agentle components. 
Use the navigation on the left to explore different parts of the API.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: API Reference
   
   agents
   generations
   prompts
   mcp
   rag
   stt
   tts

Core Components
--------------

* **Agents**: Core agent classes, pipelines, and teams
* **Generations**: Generation providers, models, and tools
* **Prompts**: Prompt management and templating
* **MCP**: Model Context Protocol for external tool access

Advanced Components
-----------------

* **RAG**: Retrieval Augmented Generation capabilities
* **STT**: Speech-to-Text functionality
* **TTS**: Text-to-Speech functionality
